attributes.action: We should know where paedophiles lives, even they released from prison
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We should know where paedophiles lives; even they released from prison. Neighbours have the right that if paedophiles living in their street. When the paedophiles released from prison, the home office must find houses for them without children living around and families. They should live in isolated places without children or families around. They should be banned from entering shops in the daytime, parks, walking past schools. They should be kept indoors under curfew from 7am till 8pm everyday and wearing electronic ankle tag all the time. They shouldn’t removed from the sex offender list at all.
